channel.title: I suggest a change to the Gauntlet Calendar time display format
channel.description:
Hello, It seems that I missed my first game on the Gauntlet Calendar because of a stupid mistake: the game was announced in the Calendar as "Tuesday, March 22nd 2022, 12:00 am" To frenchie me, this was obviously on tuesday, march the 22nd, one hour after 11:00 am. I still wonder why it's not. Right now I'm angry at the persons who thought that error (I can't think of it any other way) needed to exist, because I both missed a much waited game and was rude to my partners by not showing up.
I [strongly suggest](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/12-hour_clock#Confusion_at_noon_and_midnight) changing the time display format on the Calendar.

item.dc:creator: @DeReel
item.description:
@DeReel wrote:

0:00 is a good solution.

Precisely, I want something that is neither 12:00 am nor 12:00 pm to avoid confusion. Any solution (12 noon / 12 midnite, 24h format, etc.) suits me and I’m thankful that you look into it at all.
